metadata.name: Short Character Intro
metadata.description:
[h2][b] What is this[/b][/h2] [code][b]The 'Home' key shows a brief description of the character you are currently playing. You can change the toggle key with another key with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787]Mod Config Menu Pure[/url]. Currently, we only support Korean. English will be available in the future. [hr][/hr]Source code: https://github.com/sawalk/Short-Character-Intro (Commits slower than actual development progress.)[/b][/code]
[h2][b] Roadmap[/b][/h2] We will be updating in the following order The first update will take place in early March. [code][b]1. [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3012430463]Epiphany[/url] 2. [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3260980911]Astrobirth[/url] 3.
